title: Croquembouche
ingredients: ['For the choux pastry', '250ml water', '100g butter', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '150g plain flour', '4 eggs', 'For the creme patissiere', '2 eggs', '85g caster sugar', '1 drop vanilla extract', '40g cornflour', '500ml milk, divided', '1 (150ml carton) single cream, frozen', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 lemon, juiced', 'For the caramel', '250g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon of water', '1 tablespoon of lemon juice']
